author: Property Manager
content: Task assigned to maintenance team. Initial assessment scheduled for tomorrow morning.

author: Customer Service
content: Contacted resident via phone to confirm access for maintenance inspection. Scheduled for 11 AM tomorrow.

author: Maintenance Coordinator
content: Reviewed complaint details. Similar issue reported 3 months ago from same unit. May need to implement noise policy reminder for building.

author: Security Officer
content: Parking violation documented. Vehicle details recorded and towing notice posted.

author: Property Manager
content: Sent email notification to all residents about parking policy and visitor parking procedures.

author: Maintenance Team
content: Elevator inspection completed. Minor adjustment needed to door sensor. Repair scheduled for next week.

author: Building Manager
content: Contacted elevator service company for quote. Estimated repair cost $450. Committee approval required for expenditure.

author: Customer Service
content: Spoke with resident about water leak. Confirmed it's coming from unit above. Arranging plumber inspection.

author: Maintenance Coordinator
content: Emergency plumber dispatched. Leak source identified as faulty pipe connection. Repair in progress.

author: Building Supervisor
content: HVAC system inspection revealed dirty air filters in common areas. Scheduled replacement and cleaning for tomorrow.
